title: League of Legends has been ripped off badly

embed.description: PLAY THE GAME FREE HERE ►►► http://www.freemmostation.com/play/heroes-evolved Cheap and Awesome Games► https://www.g2a.com/r/freemmostation Join our forums! http://www.freemmostation.com/forum/ Follow Us: Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/freemmostation Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/freemmostation Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/freemmostation/ Heroes Evolved is a lightweight client based game with a heavy focus on real-time strategy and online multiplayer arena combat.

body: this new MOBA called heroes evolved is such a rip off of league because of the art style, the health bars are exactly the same, hell even their 'Rift" arena thing looks just like leagues almost. I am NOT promoting this game at all. i hate copy cat companies that do this kind of stuff. sorry if this is in the wrong sections, but holy crap this urks me.

replies.body:
That's pretty interesting. o.O

Since this isn't a request for technical assistance or a general question about League *specifically*, I recommend posting this on the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
looks like they took everything good from all the Moba's and made a reallllllllllllllly crappy moba out of it
